Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.actions.active.flow

Class ChangeTurnRequestAction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.actions.Action
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.actions.active.flow.ChangeTurnRequestAction
public class ChangeTurnRequestAction extends Action
This class represent the Action made by the Server in response of a Data sent on the network by the Client that has just finished his round and confirms the fact that his round is ended to the model
